price: 69. Allah zal tussen jullie oordelen op de Dag der Opstanding over datgene waarover jullie van mening verschilden.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فِيمَا كُنتُمۡ فِيهِ تَخۡتَلِفُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yaḥkumu baynakum yawma al-qiyāmati fīmā kuntum fīhi takhtalifūna
